content.name: Spring Native [Experimental]
content.description: Incubating support for compiling Spring applications to native executables using the GraalVM native-image compiler.

content.name: Spring Boot DevTools
content.description: Provides fast application restarts, LiveReload, and configurations for enhanced development experience.

content.name: Lombok
content.description: Java annotation library which helps to reduce boilerplate code.

content.name: Spring Configuration Processor
content.description: Generate metadata for developers to offer contextual help and "code completion" when working with custom configuration keys (ex.application.properties/.yml files).

content.name: Spring Web
content.description: Build web, including RESTful, applications using Spring MVC. Uses Apache Tomcat as the default embedded container.

links.description: Serving Web Content with Spring MVC

content.name: Spring Reactive Web
content.description: Build reactive web applications with Spring WebFlux and Netty.

content.description: Exposing Spring Data repositories over REST via Spring Data REST.

content.name: Spring Session
content.description: Provides an API and implementations for managing user session information.

content.name: Rest Repositories HAL Explorer
content.description: Browsing Spring Data REST repositories in your browser.

content.name: Spring HATEOAS
content.description: Eases the creation of RESTful APIs that follow the HATEOAS principle when working with Spring / Spring MVC.

links.description: Building a Hypermedia-Driven RESTful Web Service

content.name: Spring Web Services
content.description: Facilitates contract-first SOAP development. Allows for the creation of flexible web services using one of the many ways to manipulate XML payloads.

content.name: Jersey
content.description: Framework for developing RESTful Web Services in Java that provides support for JAX-RS APIs.

content.name: Vaadin
content.description: A web framework that allows you to write UI in pure Java without getting bogged down in JS, HTML, and CSS.

content.name: Thymeleaf
content.description: A modern server-side Java template engine for both web and standalone environments. Allows HTML to be correctly displayed in browsers and as static prototypes.

content.name: Apache Freemarker
content.description: Java library to generate text output (HTML web pages, e-mails, configuration files, source code, etc.) based on templates and changing data.

content.name: Mustache
content.description: Logic-less Templates. There are no if statements, else clauses, or for loops. Instead there are only tags.

content.name: Groovy Templates
content.description: Groovy templating engine.

content.name: Spring Security
content.description: Highly customizable authentication and access-control framework for Spring applications.

content.name: OAuth2 Client
content.description: Spring Boot integration for Spring Security's OAuth2/OpenID Connect client features.

content.name: OAuth2 Resource Server
content.description: Spring Boot integration for Spring Security's OAuth2 resource server features.

content.name: Spring LDAP
content.description: Makes it easier to build Spring based applications that use the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol.

content.name: Okta
content.description: Okta specific configuration for Spring Security/Spring Boot OAuth2 features. Enable your Spring Boot application to work with Okta via OAuth 2.0/OIDC.

links.description: Okta Spring Security Resource Server Example

content.name: JDBC API
content.description: Database Connectivity API that defines how a client may connect and query a database.

links.description: Accessing Relational Data using JDBC with Spring

content.name: Spring Data JPA
content.description: Persist data in SQL stores with Java Persistence API using Spring Data and Hibernate.

content.name: Spring Data JDBC
content.description: Persist data in SQL stores with plain JDBC using Spring Data.

content.name: Spring Data R2DBC
content.description: Provides Reactive Relational Database Connectivity to persist data in SQL stores using Spring Data in reactive applications.

content.name: MyBatis Framework
content.description: Persistence framework with support for custom SQL, stored procedures and advanced mappings. MyBatis couples objects with stored procedures or SQL statements using a XML descriptor or annotations.

content.name: Liquibase Migration
content.description: Liquibase database migration and source control library.

content.name: Flyway Migration
content.description: Version control for your database so you can migrate from any version (incl. an empty database) to the latest version of the schema.

content.name: JOOQ Access Layer
content.description: Generate Java code from your database and build type safe SQL queries through a fluent API.

content.name: IBM DB2 Driver
content.description: A JDBC driver that provides access to IBM DB2.

content.name: Apache Derby Database
content.description: An open source relational database implemented entirely in Java.

content.name: H2 Database
content.description: Provides a fast in-memory database that supports JDBC API and R2DBC access, with a small (2mb) footprint. Supports embedded and server modes as well as a browser based console application.

content.name: HyperSQL Database
content.description: Lightweight 100% Java SQL Database Engine.

content.name: MariaDB Driver
content.description: MariaDB JDBC and R2DBC driver.

content.name: MS SQL Server Driver
content.description: A JDBC and R2DBC driver that provides access to Microsoft SQL Server and Azure SQL Database from any Java application.

content.name: MySQL Driver
content.description: MySQL JDBC and R2DBC driver.

content.name: Oracle Driver
content.description: A JDBC driver that provides access to Oracle.

content.name: PostgreSQL Driver
content.description: A JDBC and R2DBC driver that allows Java programs to connect to a PostgreSQL database using standard, database independent Java code.

content.name: Spring Data Redis (Access+Driver)
content.description: Advanced and thread-safe Java Redis client for synchronous, asynchronous, and reactive usage. Supports Cluster, Sentinel, Pipelining, Auto-Reconnect, Codecs and much more.

content.name: Spring Data Reactive Redis
content.description: Access Redis key-value data stores in a reactive fashion with Spring Data Redis.

content.name: Spring Data MongoDB
content.description: Store data in flexible, JSON-like documents, meaning fields can vary from document to document and data structure can be changed over time.

content.name: Spring Data Reactive MongoDB
content.description: Provides asynchronous stream processing with non-blocking back pressure for MongoDB.

content.name: Spring Data Elasticsearch (Access+Driver)
content.description: A distributed, RESTful search and analytics engine with Spring Data Elasticsearch.

content.name: Spring Data for Apache Cassandra
content.description: A free and open-source, distributed, NoSQL database management system that offers high-scalability and high-performance.

content.name: Spring Data Reactive for Apache Cassandra
content.description: Access Cassandra NoSQL Database in a reactive fashion.

content.name: Spring for Apache Geode
content.description: Apache Geode is a data management platform that helps users build real-time, highly concurrent, highly performant and reliable Spring Boot applications at scale that is compatible with Pivotal Cloud Cache.

links.description: Switch from Apache Geode to Pivotal Cloud Cache

content.name: Spring Data Couchbase
content.description: NoSQL document-oriented database that offers in memory-first architecture, geo-distributed deployments, and workload isolation.

content.name: Spring Data Reactive Couchbase
content.description: Access Couchbase NoSQL database in a reactive fashion with Spring Data Couchbase.

content.name: Spring Data Neo4j
content.description: An open source NoSQL database that stores data structured as graphs consisting of nodes, connected by relationships.

content.name: Spring Integration
content.description: Adds support for Enterprise Integration Patterns. Enables lightweight messaging and supports integration with external systems via declarative adapters.

content.name: Spring for RabbitMQ
content.description: Gives your applications a common platform to send and receive messages, and your messages a safe place to live until received.

content.description: Publish, subscribe, store, and process streams of records.

content.description: Spring JMS support with Apache ActiveMQ Artemis.

content.description: Send email using Java Mail and Spring Framework's JavaMailSender.

content.name: Quartz Scheduler

content.name: Spring cache abstraction
content.description: Provides cache-related operations, such as the ability to update the content of the cache, but does not provide the actual data store.

content.name: Spring Boot Actuator

content.name: Codecentric's Spring Boot Admin (Client)
content.description: Required for your application to register with a Codecentric's Spring Boot Admin Server instance.

content.description: A community project to manage and monitor your Spring Boot applications. Provides a UI on top of the Spring Boot Actuator endpoints.

content.name: Datadog
content.description: Publish Micrometer metrics to Datadog, a dimensional time-series SaaS with built-in dashboarding and alerting.

content.name: Influx
content.description: Publish Micrometer metrics to InfluxDB, a dimensional time-series server that support real-time stream processing of data.

content.name: Graphite
content.description: Publish Micrometer metrics to Graphite, a hierarchical metrics system backed by a fixed-size database.

content.name: New Relic
content.description: Publish Micrometer metrics to New Relic, a SaaS offering with a full UI and a query language called NRQL.

content.description: Expose Micrometer metrics in Prometheus format, an in-memory dimensional time series database with a simple built-in UI, a custom query language, and math operations.

content.name: Sleuth
content.description: Distributed tracing via logs with Spring Cloud Sleuth.

content.name: Wavefront
content.description: Publish Micrometer metrics to Tanzu Observability by Wavefront, a SaaS-based metrics monitoring and analytics platform that lets you visualize, query, and alert over data from across your entire stack.

content.name: Zipkin Client
content.description: Distributed tracing with an existing Zipkin installation and Spring Cloud Sleuth Zipkin.

content.name: Spring REST Docs
content.description: Document RESTful services by combining hand-written with Asciidoctor and auto-generated snippets produced with Spring MVC Test.

content.name: Testcontainers
content.description: Provide lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.

content.name: Contract Verifier
content.description: Moves TDD to the level of software architecture by enabling Consumer Driven Contract (CDC) development.

content.name: Contract Stub Runner
content.description: Stub Runner for HTTP/Messaging based communication. Allows creating WireMock stubs from RestDocs tests.

content.name: Embedded LDAP Server
content.description: Provides a platform neutral way for running a LDAP server in unit tests.

content.name: Embedded MongoDB Database
content.description: Provides a platform neutral way for running MongoDB in unit tests.

content.name: Cloud Bootstrap
content.description: Non-specific Spring Cloud features, unrelated to external libraries or integrations (e.g. Bootstrap context and @RefreshScope).

content.name: Function
content.description: Promotes the implementation of business logic via functions and supports a uniform programming model across serverless providers, as well as the ability to run standalone (locally or in a PaaS).

content.name: Task
content.description: Allows a user to develop and run short lived microservices using Spring Cloud. Run them locally, in the cloud, and on Spring Cloud Data Flow.

content.description: Framework for building Spring Boot apps that implement the Open Service Broker API, which can deliver services to applications running within cloud native platforms such as Cloud Foundry, Kubernetes and OpenShift.

content.name: Config Client
content.description: Client that connects to a Spring Cloud Config Server to fetch the application's configuration.

content.description: Central management for configuration via Git, SVN, or HashiCorp Vault.

content.name: Vault Configuration
content.description: Provides client-side support for externalized configuration in a distributed system. Using HashiCorp's Vault you have a central place to manage external secret properties for applications across all environments.

content.name: Apache Zookeeper Configuration
content.description: Enable and configure common patterns inside your application and build large distributed systems with Apache Zookeeper based components. The provided patterns include Service Discovery and Configuration.

content.name: Consul Configuration
content.description: Enable and configure the common patterns inside your application and build large distributed systems with Hashicorps Consul. The patterns provided include Service Discovery, Distributed Configuration and Control Bus.

content.description: A REST based service for locating services for the purpose of load balancing and failover of middle-tier servers.

content.description: Service discovery with Apache Zookeeper.

content.description: Service discovery with Cloud Foundry.

content.description: Service discovery with Hashicorp Consul.

content.name: Gateway
content.description: Provides a simple, yet effective way to route to APIs and provide cross cutting concerns to them such as security, monitoring/metrics, and resiliency.

content.name: OpenFeign
content.description: Declarative REST Client. OpenFeign creates a dynamic implementation of an interface decorated with JAX-RS or Spring MVC annotations.

content.name: Cloud LoadBalancer
content.description: Client-side load-balancing with Spring Cloud LoadBalancer.

links.description: Client-side load-balancing with Spring Cloud LoadBalancer

content.name: Resilience4J
content.description: Spring Cloud Circuit breaker with Resilience4j as the underlying implementation.

content.name: Cloud Bus
content.description: Links nodes of a distributed system with a lightweight message broker which can used to broadcast state changes or other management instructions (requires a binder, e.g. Apache Kafka or RabbitMQ).

content.name: Cloud Stream
content.description: Framework for building highly scalable event-driven microservices connected with shared messaging systems (requires a binder, e.g. Apache Kafka, RabbitMQ or Solace PubSub+).

content.description: Config client on VMware Tanzu Application Service.

content.description: Eureka service discovery client on VMware Tanzu Application Service.

content.description: Hystrix circuit breaker client on VMware Tanzu Application Service.

content.name: Azure Support
content.description: Auto-configuration for Azure Services (Service Bus, Storage, Active Directory, Cosmos DB, Key Vault, and more).

content.description: Spring Security integration with Azure Active Directory for authentication.

content.name: Azure Key Vault
content.description: Manage application secrets and keys.

content.name: Azure Storage
content.description: Azure Storage service integration.

content.name: GCP Support
content.description: Contains auto-configuration support for every Spring Cloud GCP integration. Most of the auto-configuration code is only enabled if other dependencies are added to the classpath.

content.description: Adds the GCP Support entry and all the required dependencies so that the Google Cloud Pub/Sub integration work out of the box.

content.description: Adds the GCP Support entry and all the required dependencies so that the Google Cloud Storage integration work out of the box.
